message:
Welcome to Millennium Group of Institutions, Bhopal. The group which stands apart in the crowd of professional Institutions.
We always cherish the idea of motivating the students to enlighten the path of darkness & illuminate it with their ideas and knowledge, rather than allowing them to opt and travel the lighted path.
It is the Knowledge that has become the most important tool in this new era. In today's Digital World, one has to be on the toes to Aim, Prepare & Compete on the Spot to be the Best of the lot.

Our primary focus is to impart Innovation & Excellence in the students along with the Social Values.

Millennium Group of Institutions, Bhopal is a self financed group established in the year 1999 and posses all the important approvals, affiliations and associations with the key governing bodies namely AICTE, RGPV, BU, MPMSU, PCI, NCTE, MPNRC.
Our Vision is to provide quality education by equipping students with knowledge, skills & values and providing them opportunities to realize their dreams of becoming future leaders, entrepreneurs and above all good human beings.
Our Mission is to prepare Youth not only for the glorious future, but also create glorious future for the Youth.

Chairman MGI
Er. Vinod Yadav B.E., MBA
details:
Welcome to MGI - The Institutes that make a difference. We at MGI cherish the idea of motivating our students towards innovation, excellence & continuous development. It is our constant endeavour to provide support to our students through not just our highly qualified & experienced faculty members, but also our state of the art infrastructure & friendly environment. The Millennium Education & Development Society was established in 1999. Growing in leaps & bounds, it now has 12 colleges running successfully.

MITS (Millennium Institute of Technology & Science),

message: Welcome to IES Collage of Technology, Bhopal. Main aim of the Group institutions is to provide education to the really aspiring youth who want to pursue studies in Engineering & Technology, Pharmaceutical, Management and Education disciplines leading to B.E, B.Pharma, M.B.A, B. Ed & M. Ed degrees to meet the challenge of globalization and liberalization. We live in an exciting and rapidly changing information age surrounded by Internet, digital multimedia, e-commerce and instant communication. These technologies involve the processing of huge quantities of information and data. The challenge is to learn from this data to find hidden patterns and underlying relationships in order to solve problems where traditional approaches of Knowledge Professionals, who are skilled in their intelligent interpretation and manipulation, are not successful.
details: InfoTech Education Society (IES) was established in 1999 as a society for Education and Social Welfare. The initial focus of the society was on popularization of Science & Technology awareness and the upliftment of people. In the next five years, the agenda became much more broad-based to include conduct of formal education and training courses in various fields.

message:
Welcome to RGI – Radharaman Group of Institutes. Radharaman Group of Institutes (RGI) emphasizes on all-round development of its students. It aims at not only producing good professionals but also good and worthy citizens of a great country aiding in its overall progress and development. It is our endeavor to create a proper ambiance for students by providing every opportunity and to inculcate in them the desire to excel so that they become globally competitive. We are honor-bound to impart the world-class quality technical education.
R. R. Saxena
Chairman RGI
details:
The success story of Radharaman Group of Institutes begins in the year 2003 when the Typasya Education Society started its first technical institute Radhraman B to Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidhyalaya (RGPV) Bhopal). The Institute provides a creative learning environment of managerial skills & discovery of principles, concepts & values. Presently, the institute is running programs offering B.E./B.Tech., Diploma in Engg., M.B.A., M.Tech, M.Pharma, B.Pharma, Diploma in Pharmacy degrees.
A great leap in the field of education was taken by Radharaman Group of Institute with the opening of Radharaman Engineering College [REC] in 2005. REC (Approved by AICTE and affiliated to RGPV Bhopal) offers Bachelor of Engineering courses CS, EC, IT, CE and M.Tech., Diploma Engg. and MBA courses which promises to provide the best education to would-be technocrats of our country.
Society introduced Radhraman Institute of Pharmaceutical Sciences (Approved by AICTE, New Delhi and affiliated to RGPV Bhopal) in 2006 and Radharaman College of Pharmacy (Approved by AICTE, New Delhi and affiliated to RGPV Bhopal) in 2004 offering B.Pharm and M.Pharm courses.

message: At Sage Group, we focus on grooming young minds as the pillar of advancement of a nation and hope of the future. Every member of our group aims to promote education and culture in all aspects in order to achieve and fulfill the mission statement that we believe in. We try to maintain the academic standards which help our students to achieve remarkable and excellent results. As a Sageian, we believe in humanity, discipline, punctuality, and regularity. We nurture our students to become world-class professionals who can achieve the affirmed purpose of our great late President, Honorable Abdul Kalam, to make our nation a "SUPERPOWER".
details:
SAGE University, Bhopal is a leading institute in the educational hub Bhopal. It has a total of 11 departments i.e. Advanced Computing, Agriculture, Art, Humanities, & Social Sciences, Commerce, Computer Application, Design, Engineering & Technology, Journalism and Mass Communication, Management, Performing Arts, and Sciences. The institute provides a total of 80 courses out of which 39 are UG courses and 41 are PG courses.
Admission to SAGE University is done on the basis of the SAGE University Entrance Exam. The candidates can apply for the exam by visiting the official website of the university. The candidates are required to make an online payment of INR 1600, which can be done by Credit Card/ Debit Card/ UPI/ Wallet/ Saved Card.

details:
Over 700 computers with 24 hrs internet connectivity. Two separate connections dedicated leased lines 80Mbps from BSNL Lease Line. Volumes available 20,000+ Titles available 1500+ National & International Journals available 100+ CD/DVD-based/online learning materials
Academics
There are lots of trades in our college like - computer science engineering, mechanical engineering, Civil engineering, Electrical, Pharmacy, MBA, diploma in Engineering from various trades, diploma in pharmacy, mining Engineering.
Placements
The Placement Office is assisted by a committee comprising representatives of students and faculty from all streams. The committee evolves a broad policy framework every year besides a set of rules which are inviolable. The uniqueness also lies in the fact that this cell takes post placement feedback from our students and helps them with any questions and concerns. This cell also counsels them, and the continuous interaction helps T&P cell to maintain relations with corporates also.

details:
A renowned institution of higher learning, Swami Vivekanand College of Science and Technology has its roots in Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh since 2006.
Institute offers 9 courses which are Degree in Full Time mode.
Overall, Institute has diversified 6 UG courses.
Institute enjoys a good reputation for courses like B. Ed, B.E. / B.Tech, MBA/PGDM, M.E./M.Tech in the streams of Teaching & Education, Engineering and Business & Management Studies.
Students can opt courses from these.
Over the period, Swami Vivekanand College of Science and Technology has gained expertise through its trained and experienced faculty in the fields of Computer Science Engineering, Civil Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Information Technology, Mechanical Engineering, Communications Engineering.
Courses offered by the institute are recognized by reputed approving bodies like NCTE, AICT.
Institute has a capacity of taking 379 students overall under all courses.
Institute has a well-supported campus with facilities like Auditorium, Cafeteria, Gym, Hospital / Medical Facilities, Hostel, Labs, Library, Sports Complex, Wi-Fi Campus.

message:
Various models of Teaching and Learning, Evaluation and Assessments, skill building, employability of internationally practiced model are successfully implemented. Students are also encouraged for online certification courses which are likely to be integrated as a credit in future. This innovative approach not only gives young technocrats an inquisitive bent of mind but encourages them to think out-of-the box. Students also gain the confidence to face challenges in the real world.
It is a well acknowledged and established fact that the Bhopal institute of technology and science practice and promote 'holistic education' which is a remarkable rich blend of curricular, co-curricular and extra-curricular learning and practices. BITS once again welcomes you to join this vivacious and exciting new world of science and technology and wishes all the aspiring students all the very best for a rewarding career and a bright future.
I invite you to experience the unique environment at BITS, which is a blend of tradition and modernity and is evolving continuously.
details:
Bhopal Institute of Technology & Science, is one of the siblings of Globus Group of Institutions and is a premier self-financed engineering college of M.P. The Globus Group of Institutions established in 2002, is one of technical education giants located in a lush green 200+ acre campus in the outskirts of Bhopal city in Madhya Pradesh. The group is an entity of Globus Institute of Engineering & Technology[GIET], an education society came in vogue with the intent to spread technical education with ease & convenience to all aspirants. The group is imparting technical /pharmacy education for the award of under graduate degree B.E. & B.Pharma. and post graduate degree M.Tech and M.Pharma. Within a short span of 16 years it has created a name in the technical education domain in the state of Madhya Pradesh. Of late, the Apex body AICTE has recognised the group and approved four engineering and two pharmacy colleges.
Bhopal Institute of Technology & Science (BITS) is situated in the capital of Madhya Pradesh, Bhopal. Bhopal is famous for it’s scenic beauty and diverse culture. Also, it has developed into an important education centre of Central India.
The institute runs courses approved by AICTE, Department of Technical Education –Govt. of M.P. and is affiliated to Rajiv Gandhi Praudyogiki  Vishwavidhyalaya , Bhopal. U.G. courses are available in Civil Engineering , Computer Science & Engineering , Electronics and Communication Engineering , Electrical and Electronics Engineering and Mechanical Engineering. Post Graduate courses are available in Computer Science (CSE), Mechanical (Thermal Systems) and Electrical & Electronics (Power Systems).
Hostel facilities are provided for boys and girls. Boys hostels are situated on the college campus whereas the girls hostels are situated in a prime city location near Habibganj Railway station. Bus facility is available from all parts of the city to the campus.
The college ensures the safety and well being of it’s students , faculty , staff and visitors through a robust security system which is closely monitored and special team is constituted to make our system zero tolerant towards ragging.
We ensure that a student here becomes an asset to himself,family,college,society and country at large.

message:
Dear, Students,
Welcome!

Truly said “Man behind the machine is more important than the machine itself”. The Man Behind Surabhi college of engineering & technology, Mr. Santosh Ramtani , Chairman of the Society is a visionary and dynamic personality. He is highly Qualified ex Banker and Real Estate Developer. Satyam Education & Social Welfare Society which run this group was founded in the year 2006 by the group of ex Bankers, Real Estate Developers & Industrialists which are functioning in Central India. The Group is planning to establish a Software Center , BPO, Research Center & Huge Auditorium in tie-up with foreign University to train the students and send them abroad for work experience. Our country is now a fast developing economy and accordingly a planned approach in higher technical education is the need of the hour and so we intent to fill this void.
details: The promotion of an academic ethos of meritocracy and the nurturing of bright and globally acceptable talent are essential for creating a strong knowledge infrastructure in the field of education. By prioritizing meritocracy, we can ensure that the most deserving students are given opportunities to succeed and contribute to society. Along with this, we need to provide an environment that fosters creativity, innovation, and critical thinking, enabling students to develop into competent and well-rounded individuals. By doing so, we can not only develop a highly skilled workforce but also create leaders who can tackle the challenges of the 21st century.

message:
Welcome to Mittal Group of Institutions, Bhopal. This era of knowledge requires people of high capability, creativity and intelligence who besides possessing the core subjective knowledge, must also be equipped with the relevant skill sets to serve the ever growing demand of mankind and brain power required in industries world over. Mittal Group of Institutes is committed to develop young minds for creative leadership and a proactive and useful role in social transformation.
Mittal Group of Institutes offers its students the very best in terms of infrastructure and resources. The College lays great emphasis on high quality education. Its unique learning approach designed to significantly contribute to the growth and development of each student. The learning environment of the institute is challenging and requires disciplined conduct from the students.
Mittal Group of Institutes is flourishing under the guidance of our honorable chairman and Group Advisor who are eminent personalities in their fields. Our team of employees is working like a honey bee network to achieve excellence.
I am thankful to all my colleagues who are striving hard to establish Mittal Group of Institutes as one of the leading Engineering Institutions. Our vision is to achieve knowledge and excellence in the global economy. Genuine success comes only to those who are ready for it, so never step back and always have the courage to accept new challenges. May you get succeed and achieve all your goals you have set.
Thanks
details:
Mittal Group of Institutes has established its mark since its inception as the bold and ambitious leader in the education industry. It derives its strength from the concrete value-system and the resilient foundation laid by the reputed and well-recognized academician (Late) Prof. N.K. Mittal. A man of wisdom and vision, he founded MGI with the mission to create an institute open for students from every strata, an organization that’s sole aim is to deliver quality education and nurture young talent.
Mittal Group of Institutes started as a technical institute and has since spread its wings in different educational sectors and has built a commendable repute in the region for its commitment to excellence and honesty towards delivering the best to their students. message: Technology plays a dominant role in the economic and societal development of the nation. A nation on the progressive path needs technically sound human resources for achieving multifarious technical capabilities, thereby, opening new prospective avenues for human welfare. With a vision to direct the development of technology and technical education in a direction which is generally worthwhile and challenging, the LNCT Group was established in 1993. Jai Narain College of Technology, Bhopal being a part of this endeavor, is committed to give knowledge, wisdom and character and to impart the best quality technical education and personality behavior. I am proud to say that JNCT is following the principles and policies of LNCT Group meticulously and molding the students for dynamic change with life-long skills, character and desire for continuous learning and improvement with a world-class outlook. I extend a hearty welcome to all those who wish to join the LNCT Group family.
details: Jai Narain College of Technology (JNCT), Bhopal is considered to be unique in engineering education as it is firmly rooted in local soil and capable of articulating Indian ethos. In the contemporary era, where Globalization and liberalization are the buzz words, the college, without disturbing the said roots, endeavors to meet the engineering challenges, sentiments, and opportunities that are going to present themselves on account of the new economic order. This translates into the symbiotic affiliation with the corporate magnets, equipping the students with technical acumen to become tomorrow’s leaders.

message:
Having a glorious past of about 15 years and has been a foremost institution in Technical Education in the central India region, this institute is recognized as a temple of learning and has contributed to nation building through its pass out students having talent, analytical abilities, and managerial skills. These students have brought many laurels not only to this institute but to Madhya Pradesh and Bhopal in particular.
Our students have a strong presence almost in all sectors viz. government, private, and public sectors and our competent faculty and state of art infrastructure help them in their overall development to meet challenges even at the global level and come out creating a hallmark in different fields.
It is my strong conviction that the students of this great temple of learning will keep on adding new feathers to their cap and making us proud of them.
I extend a warm invitation to all recruiters looking for future ready engineers to visit our serene campus and collaborate with us for various industry programs like guest lecture, mentorship, joint R&D projects and any other special requirements that are put forth will be complied by us with best regards and appreciation.
Director
Dr. Bharat Kishore Gupta
details:
Corporate Group of Institutions (CGI) were established in the city of lakes BHOPAL with a unique philanthropic vision of the Founder Chairman Er. Sunil Kumar Gupta, to establish a world-class educational institution to offer Qualitative Professional Education at the common man's affordability level on a sustainable growth basis.
Corporate Group of Institutions run under the aegis of 'ESSARJEE EDUCATION SOCIETY.' The foundation stone for the Institutes was laid by Honorable Mr. G.C. Shah in the year 2008 with the vision to impart quality technical education to all. Since inception, the Institute has been carving new milestones in the field of technical education.
CGI is approved by AICTE, PCI, Ministry of HRD, Govt. of India, and DTE Madhya Pradesh and is affiliated with Rajiv Gandhi Technical University and Barkatullah University BHOPAL -which has been accredited by NAAC.
The culture at CGI is transparent and based on mutual trust and faith. There are ample facilities and opportunities to develop physical and mental abilities imparting academic and overall excellence through sports, recreational, dramatics, debates, and much more. CGI has the philosophy of imparting education to develop human potential to its fullest extent so that intellectually proficient and ingeniously talented leaders can emerge.
The basic aim of CGI is to impart technical training to the students to transform them into technologically efficient employable professionals. To foster technological transformations among students, we have an integrated Training & Placement Cell. The various Clubs and Training Centers at CGI are Computer Lab, Mechatronics Centre, Cyber Security Lab, Language Lab, Soft Skills Center, Robotics Lab, CAD/CAM Center, Sports Club, Management Lab, Pharmacy Lab, Software Solutions Services Lab, Summer Training Club.
The college has its annual Techno-Cultural fair which is a platform for showcasing the talent of students and also to enhance positive exposure to our students.

name: Rajeev Gandhi Proudyogiki Mahavidyalaya - RGPM
address: Via, Near, Kolar Rd, Danish Kunj , Salaiya , Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh 462026

branches.BE/B.Tech: Computer Science Engineering, Digital Communication, Electrical Engineering, Electronics Engineering

message:
Rajeev Gandhi College, started under the aegis of Chauhan Education Society in 1994, has been successful in taking forward the vision of its managing society, which is reflected in the society’s motto, “Education with a Social commitment”.
Our College is one of the very few non-government colleges in M.P., which apart from other courses, have excelled far ahead in its approach for educating students in Professional Courses. The well-developed and carefully planned courses in this field are bound to succeed as the college believes in education with the provision of the best resources, guidance, attention, care, and encouragement for our students.
We have a vision of developing our students into Specialists in their field. To groom them with a strong personality along with requisite professional abilities, we have included various ‘Career Guidance’ and ‘Personality Development’ modules as a part of our regular curriculum. Special efforts are made to create the feeling of Humanity & Belongingness to society.
Ours is a mission to promote quality education, to help students in their urge to gain knowledge, to promote the feeling of National integration among the students, to contribute to national development, and last but not least to help its students achieve all-round Development. We are committed to providing purposeful education with an approach for achieving not only academic excellence but also to enable our students to successfully fulfill the demands of today’s professional life & meet the challenges ahead. We pray to the Almighty that He should give us the strength to achieve success in our mission.
Mr. Sandeep Chauhan
(Chairman)
details:
Rajeev Gandhi group of institution is run by Chauhan Education Society established in 1991. The society has more than 50 disciplines reckoned at state and national level. The society has been doing pineal works and is a leading name in the field of professional and medical education. Our motto is “Committed to Achieve Excellence in Education”. Rajeev Gandhi College of Pharmacy was established by Chauhan Education Society in the year 2004 and has achieved a remarkable position in the field of Pharmacy education. The institute is offering D. Pharm., B. Pharm. and M. Pharm. (Pharmaceutics) courses.
• Pharmacy Council of India, New Delhi
• All India Council for Technical Education, New Delhi
• Directorate of Technical Education, Madhya Pradesh

message:
“We cannot always build the future for our students, but we can build our students for the future”
Vaishnavi Group offers the dynamic, responsive, broad, and engaging range of knowledge in the modern world. The participation of students and faculty members releases creative energies which influence every member to move ahead. Education is essential for the continuation of a person’s growth. In this highly competitive educational scenario, it is important to keep abreast. With higher education you don’t just keep abreast, you move ahead. Your choice of education will shape your future. Education is the building block of human experience. It is not just an integral part of your professional life but greatly influences your overall personality. Our approach is divided into three parts, which are to motivate, to monitor and to guide, with this aim we have shaped ourselves and looking forward to shaping our precious students as well.
Dr. Rajendra Singh Sikarwar
(Director)
details: VGI has various support cells which facilitate 360-degree learning and career-building opportunities during the learning period as well as after the completion. Research & Development Cell, Entrepreneurship Development Cell, Career Development Cell, Training & Placement Cell, International Relations Cell, International Students’ Affair Cell, Department of Events & Media Relations, Students’ Council, Alumni Association and to name a few. Campus is an immaculate blend of youth under the guidance of experienced academicians creating a serene academic ambiance of teaching, learning, knowledge & innovation for all the stakeholders.

message:
Vidhyapeeth is striving hard to be a leader in shaping the future of engineering education.
Our focus is to develop technocrats who could tackle the challenges of the industry by continuously updating their knowledge and always keeping close contact with the state-of-the-art technologies. We emphasize on building technocrats of tomorrow & I would like to reinforce that our endeavor is to keep a balance between education and culture. We inculcate what the industrial sector requires.
We have accepted education & training as the primary mode of serving the society at large. This should not be taken for granted by any stretch of imagination that our endeavor is to groom only future technocrats. We do understand and remember that unless the downtrodden and vulnerable sections of the society are simultaneously served for their upliftment to the best of our ability, we would be failing in our social responsibility.
I believe, by working together in an environment of trust and support, we would be able to achieve more success & fame in the years to come.
Jai Hind
K.N. SUHANE
Chairman, VGI, Bhopal
details:
WELCOME TO VIDHYAPEETH GROUP OF INSTITUTIONS.
Vidhyapeeth aims to become the best group of institutions in Bhopal. To come out as the best College for Engineering and the best College for Professional Graduation Courses. This necessarily demands the best college infrastructure, best classrooms, up-to-date laboratories, and libraries. For being the best engineering college in Bhopal and the best graduation college in Bhopal, Vidhyapeeth has well-qualified faculties and they are regularly motivated through graduation programs.
All the departments identified for the various graduation and post-graduation programs have been implemented to bring out the best from the students and to build up their all-round persona. From the very beginning, Vidhyapeeth focuses on imparting high-end education.
Our courses are highly relevant and upgraded according to the developing industries and trends to meet their demands of manpower. We work on preparing students who are ready to face the professional world and ready for employment.

name: Truba Group of Institutes, Bhopal
address: Karond - Gandhi Nagar, Bypass Rd, Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh 462038

branches.BE/B.Tech: Civil Engineering, Computer Science and Engineering, Electrical And Electronics Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Artificial Intelligence, Computer Science and Business Systems, Artificial Intelligence and Data Engineering
branches.BE/B.Tech (Lateral Entry): Computer Science Engineering, Digital Communication, Electrical Engineering, Electronics Engineering
branches.M.Tech: Computer Science And Engineering, Energy Technology, Structural Engineering, Thermal Engineering

message:
Drastic & fast developments are taking place in various fields around the world; due to this, the world becomes a smaller place. Since India has emerged as an un-ignorable country on the world map in recent years, the task at hand is more enthralling than ever before.
Truba Group of Institutes (TGI) is working with the vision to become a Research, Innovation, and Entrepreneurship Group of Institutes. In view of NEP 2020 and employers' future demand, we prepare the students in a way so that they can face the challenges of the 21st Century by providing global education in a local environment. The students not only be holistically educated with a multidisciplinary approach but with a strong command over the 21st-century skills, research skills, innovation skills, and entrepreneurship skills.
TGI is also committed to Atmanirbhar Bharat Abhiyaan and focuses on Research that can impact the development of the society at large. We ensure that our research should be able to address the problems of society through innovations in Science, Technology, Engineering, & Management.
The TRUBA Group, a premier group of institutes in central India, since its establishment in 2001, has been glorifying with the blessings of Lord TiRUpati BAlaji. Our various institutes, namely, Truba Institute of Engineering & Information Technology (TIEIT), Truba College of Science & Technology (TCST), Truba Institute of Pharmacy (TIP), and Truba Institute of Science & Commerce (TISC), provide education in engineering, pharmacy, science, commerce, and management.
Ever since its establishment, our conglomerate of students, staff, and faculty have endeavored towards creating young and dynamic graduates and postgraduates who will form the crux of the skilled workforce of tomorrow in their respective fields. In our quest to provide the country with the best working talent, we have created a disciplined environment that, at the same time, provides everyone with the creative freedom to think out of the box. It has always been our belief that every student has an unending pool of talent that needs to be nurtured and which, when guided with proper care and the correct attitude, can help bring out the best from any individual.
details:
TRUBA Group of Institutes is engaged in carrying out quality education in the field of technological development. It imparts training to students so that they become competent and motivated intellectuals. Truba celebrates freedom of thoughts, cultivates human values, and concerns for the environment and the society. The institutes of Truba Group are rated among the top colleges of MP. TRUBA Group of Institutes is a renowned name in the field of technical & professional education in the Central India region. The group was formed in the year 2001 at Bhopal, nurtured and promoted by the Young & Dynamic Technocrats under the auspicious guidance from the senior most technocrats, who have vast experience of serving the state government under various capacities.

Our Institutes-
Truba Institute of Engineering & Information Technology (T.I.E.I.T).
Truba Institute of Pharmacy (TIP)
Truba College of Science & Technology (TCST)
Truba Institute of Science & Commerce

name: SAM Group of institutions  Bhopal
address: Gram Adampur Chawni, Kolua, Raisen Rd, Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh 462021

branches.BE/B.Tech: Computer Science Engineering, Digital Communication, Electrical Engineering, Electronics Engineering
branches.BE/B.Tech (Lateral Entry): Computer Science Engineering, Digital Communication, Electrical Engineering, Electronics Engineering
branches.M.Tech: Civil, Mechanical, Electrical, Electronics, Computer Science, Architecture and Interior Design
branches.Diploma: Computer Science Engineering, Digital Communication, Electrical Engineering, Electronics Engineering

message:
Welcome to SAM GROUP OF INSTITUTIONS, where academics and activities never end and the students are molded as future technocreates and business leaders. The Institute works on the vision to become one of the leading centers of teaching, research, and extensions in the field of Management and Engineering through total commitment towards quality education training. In the words of the great visionary honorable APJJ ABDUL KALAM, 'Learning gives creativity, Creativity leads to thinking, Thinking provides knowledge, Knowledge makes you GREAT.'

We are committed to nurturing juvenile minds and preparing them for challenges in today's globalized knowledge and technologies. The doors of our faculty members are always open for any student who seeks help. We encourage all the students to use their time with professors and teaching staff fruitfully, to develop their own proficiency. The extracurricular activities will include effective communication through speaking and writing, inclusion of communication languages like English make our students globally adoptable. May God bless every institution of SAM GROUP and all those who labor untiringly to keep it moving ahead on the path of progress. May we learn from the past, live fully in the present with a hope of a bright FUTURE.

Ms. Preeti Saluja
Executive Director
details:
SAM GROUP OF INSTITUTIONS is a leading group of central India providing world-class infrastructure and excellence in education. Our founder Chairman Late Shri I.S. Saluja deserves the due homage of immortals. He founded the SAM Educational Society over four and a half decades ago with a vision to offer quality-based education to students of all backgrounds.

SAM Group started with SAM Public School in the year 1968 followed by SAM Girls College in the year 1999 and SAM College of Engineering and Technology in 2007. SAM offers various courses also through SAM College of Education and SAM Nursing College. We also offer post-graduation courses in PGDCA and SAM College of Management.

Striking feature of SAM is its sprawling campus and a state-of-the-art infrastructure. The latest technologies are provided on the campus with modern labs to encourage students to be updated with the latest upcoming trends in their field of study.

Our aim is to teach students to LEARN, not just STUDY. Hence, we strive to travel beyond the boundaries of mere books.

Institutions under Flagship of SAM Group:
- SAM College Of Engineering & Technology (BE, M.Tech, MCA, MBA & Diploma in ME & CE)
- SAM College Of Management & Technology (MBA)
- SAM College (BBA, BCA, B. Com, B.Com (Hons.), B.Com(Comp. Application))
- SAM College Of Education (B.Ed & D.Ed)
- SAM Nursing College (BA, B. Com, B.Sc, M.Sc, M.Com & Ph.D)
- SAM Computer Academy (PGDCA)
- SAM Higher Secondary School
